body: Don't think about logic in hentai. Christ you should know that Shin(MC of Kenja) is so OP he could kill a dragon and Sicily the Heroine of this Hentai is also so powerful in strength random blokes won't harm her. So with this you should just throw away any semblance of logic and just think of her as a weak and powerless girl. Even if she was a saint. No Comment about Hoshiguma though.
@zombieadd Lmao what else are you supposed to read hentai for? You expecting some kind of Tolkien epic when reading hentai doujins?
Good art, not the best but still good, however both stories are plagued with so much dumb logic it's better just use as fap material at this point.
